Name: High King Arthur Pendragon
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with Excalibur.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Friendly KNIGHTS OF THE ROUND TABLE Formations within 6" of this model can re-roll failed hit rolls in the Melee Combat Step.

When this model completes a charge, select 1 enemy Formation within 1" of this model and roll a D6, on a result of 3+, the selected Formation cannot fight in the Melee Combat Step until all other eligible models have done so.
